TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExportConventionBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 配置与部件关联的导出。

span.span: Configures an export that is associated with a part.

span.span: The name of the metadata to add.

param.name: getValueFromPartType
param.span: 提供将添加的元数据值的函数。

span.span: A function that provides the value of the metadata to add.

summary.span: 将具有指定名称和值的元数据添加到导出中。

span.span: Adds metadata that has the specified name and value to the export.
